no_arguments: Sorry, but the c!togglecheck command expects 1 argument. You can either set to check **cards** or **tokens**.
card_disabled_message: Getting a card that you have none of in your storage will no longer be notified!
card_enabled_message: Getting a card that you have none of in your storage will now be notified!
token_disabled_message: How many tokens you have after receiving or giving will no longer be notified!
token_enabled_message: How many tokens you have after receiving or giving will now be notified!
